items.text: short of a length on middle stump, tapped to midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, no run

items.text: tails away from the keeper down leg side and hurries to the boundary. Bouncer was very short and Guptill ducked it. It kept moving away from Rahim down leg side and his dive wasn't sufficient
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, 5 wides

items.text: length on off stump, defended to extra cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: length at the stumps, poked into the leg side
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, no run

items.text: length and wide outside off. Left alone
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, no run

items.text: length at leg stump, flicked to fine leg
items.postText: And a chance in commentary along with the bowling. Vishal and Sabbir are in.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, 1 run

items.preText: Thanks, Varun. Sabbir's presence might make a difference compared to mine
items.text: pretty straight on the stumps, tucked off the back foot behind square to leg
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Williamson, no run

items.text: shortish on middle and leg, no turn and it's helped down to long-on and that's the team 100
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: into the midwicket boundary! Another short ball, Guptill cashes in on the long hop opportunity by rocking back on the back foot and pulling that over the fielder's head
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Guptill, SIX runs

items.text: outside off now, cut off the back foot for one
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: hint of room, bit of turn away from the batsman and Williamson waits to cut that in the air and right in between backward point and short third man for his first four
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Williamson, FOUR runs

items.text: shortish on middle and leg, pushed to long-on and he keeps strike
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Williamson, 1 run

items.preText: Another change - Soumya Sarkar comes on now, no slips
items.text: 120kmh, slightly short and pulled to deep midwicket for one
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: just a bit of room on the off side, on back of length, and it's punched wide of mid-off in the gap. Guptill calls for two immediately but gets three
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Guptill, 3 runs

items.text: shot again, this time Williamson waits for the ball to come to him, pivots on the back foot and then pulls it behind square to beat the fielders in the deep for four
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Williamson, FOUR runs

items.text: more accurate on the off stump now, he tucks it to leg for one
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: length delivery on middle and leg, nudges it to midwicket
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Guptill, no run

items.text: some width on the off side and it's punched wide of mid-off again for one
items.postText: 23 off the last two overs even though the Powerplay is over. Bangladesh running out of options
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: bit of flight on the stumps, he defends it back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, no run

items.text: pretty slow around middle and leg, he helps it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, no run

items.text: turning into Guptill, he works it away square on the leg side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: covers the stumps and then punches the ball down to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: chips the ball back in the air for a second, but well wide of Mehidy towards long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: goes back to cover the stumps, and then helps the ball to leg for one more
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: nicely tossed up outside off, Williamson leans forward and blocks
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Williamson, no run
